title: 随机跑酷 随机の跑酷 教程
author: 彪悍的新手
txt_content:
刚才的随机跑酷 随机の跑酷想必大家很想知道原理其实非常简单。
一个随机器：
/setblock ~ ~-2 ~ minecraft:mob_spawner 0 replace {MinSpawnDelay:10,MaxSpawnDelay:10,SpawnCount:1,Delay:1,RequiredPlayerRange:100,MaxNearbyEntities:1,SpawnRange:1,EntityId:FallingSand,SpawnPotentials:[
{Type:FallingSand,Properties:{Pos:[753.0,16.5,-149.5],Time:1,DropItem:1,TileID:152,EntityId:FallingSand},Weight:1},{Type:FallingSand,Properties:{Pos:[754.0,16.5,-149.5],Time:1,DropItem:1,TileID:152,EntityId:FallingSand},Weight:1},{Type:FallingSand,Properties:{Pos:[755.0,16.5,-149.5],Time:1,DropItem:1,TileID:152,EntityId:FallingSand},Weight:1},{Type:FallingSand,Properties:{Pos:[756.0,16.5,-149.5],Time:1,DropItem:1,TileID:152,EntityId:FallingSand},Weight:1},{Type:FallingSand,Properties:{Pos:[757.0,16.5,-149.5],Time:1,DropItem:1,TileID:152,EntityId:FallingSand},Weight:1},{Type:FallingSand,Properties:{Pos:[758.0,16.5,-149.5],Time:1,DropItem:1,TileID:152,EntityId:FallingSand},Weight:1},{Type:FallingSand,Properties:{Pos:[759.0,16.5,-149.5],Time:1,DropItem:1,TileID:152,EntityId:FallingSand},Weight:1},{Type:FallingSand,Properties:{Pos:[760.0,16.5,-149.5],Time:1,DropItem:1,TileID:152,EntityId:FallingSand},Weight:1},{Type:FallingSand,Properties:{Pos:[761.0,16.5,-149.5],Time:1,DropItem:1,TileID:152,EntityId:FallingSand},Weight:1}]}复制代码这个是PM101的随机器。
有了这个随机器，一切就万事大吉了呵呵
但是我要生成方块，就需要/setblock指令，但是我需要让玩家生成方块，就需要/execute指令。
/execute @p ~ ~ ~ setblock ~-3 ~ ~ minecraft:stained_hardened_clay 1复制代码在玩家的x轴-3的地方生成染色粘土。
如果换成@a的话就可以实现多人了（但是我现在才想到的，所以地图里没有），如果换成@r的话就更好了。
最后以/setblock ~ ~ ~-1 minecraft:air 0复制代码结尾，清楚掉掉落沙。
完了啊
呵呵886
